trans-unit.source: Provides an interface for obtaining references to objects within a project by name or type, obtaining the name of a specified object, and for locating the parent of a specified object within a designer project.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService> interface provides the following methods:
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetReference%2A> method returns the component with the specified name, or `null` if no component with the specified name was found.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetName%2A> method returns the name associated with the specified component.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetComponent%2A> method returns the parent container of the specified component.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetReferences%2A> method returns an array of references to all project components, or all project components of an optionally specified type.
Gets the component that contains the specified component.
The object to retrieve the parent component for.
The base <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> that contains the specified object, or `null` if no parent component exists.
Gets the name of the specified component.
The name of each component sited in a design time project is set in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> where the component is sited.
The object to return the name of.
The name of the object referenced, or `null` if the object reference is not valid.
Gets a reference to the component whose name matches the specified name.
The name of the component to return a reference to.
An object the specified name refers to, or `null` if no reference is found.
Gets all available references to project components.
An array of all objects with references available to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService"></xref>.
Gets all available references to components of the specified type.
The type of object to return references to instances of.
An array of all available objects of the specified type.
